minemons.species.pumpkid.name: Pumpkid
minemons.species.pumpkid.desc: This pokémon is known to care for the crops of farmers. It is commonly seen sunbathing.
minemons.species.gallagourd.name: Gallagourd
minemons.species.gallagourd.desc: This pokémon protects weaker pokemon from their predators. If it is ever separated from it's iron suit, it returns to being a pumpkid.
minemons.species.nitkick.name: Nitkick
minemons.species.nitkick.desc: It is a powerful pokemon, but it's stubbornness against following orders makes it an unpopular choice.
minemons.species.anonkey.name: Anonkey
minemons.species.anonkey.desc: It destroys everything in it's path. There is no reason, it is chaos incarnate. One kick could send even a snorlax flying.
minemons.species.bowne.name: Bowne
minemons.species.bowne.desc: It carries a handcrafted bow of bone at all times. This pokémon is never seen without it.
minemons.species.bognmarrow.name: Bognmarrow
minemons.species.bognmarrow.desc: It patrols it's territory with a platoon of fellow Bognmarrow. Whichever one has the bigger mushroom is the leader... allegedly.
minemons.species.ivorice.name: Ivorice
minemons.species.ivorice.desc: While a solitary pokemon, it sometimes hunts with pokemon of similar cruelty, such as Weavile or Froslass.
minemons.species.withereign.name: Withereign
minemons.species.withereign.desc: This sinister pokemon absorbs the souls of both it's enemies and allies to fuel it's power.
minemons.species.ocatalyst.name: Ocatalyst
minemons.species.ocatalyst.desc: It uses the alchemical flask on it's tail to brew strange concoctions from berries. It's surpisingly sanitary.
